column4: okay, i've got nvidia x server up, and im enabling my secondary monitor, but it says i must press apply , and then save x configuration file.... but when i click save to x configuration file, it tells me Unable to remove old X config backup file '/etc/X11/xorg.conf.backup'.

okay, i've got nvidia x server up, and im enabling my secondary monitor, but it says i must press apply , and then save x configuration file.... but when i click save to x configuration file, it tells me Unable to remove old X config backup file '/etc/X11/xorg.conf.backup'.
